short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple notepad extension for Google Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple notepad extension for Google Chrome.

Are you too lazy to open a notepad app? Yes, I am. In that case, just install Blankpad, and click the icon or press ctrl/command + B.

Enjoy!
